Brasil - alguns apontamentos

Authors Manuel Motta Cardoso
Oskar
Year 1961
Origin Brazil
Tagged Brazil non-fiction tourism commerce government illustration propaganda
Type book
Reference RS.040.0007

About

Published by the Brazilian government’s «office of propaganda and commercial expansion in Lisbon», the book goes through the history, demographics, economy, and culture of the country.

Colophon

rsda is a design archive with a special focus on nineteenth century Portuguese graphic design and illustration. The archive currently contains 20 artifacts. Maintained by Ricardo Santos.

All materials created by rsda are shared under a CC Attribution-Share Alike license. Artworks and other resources are shared for educational and research purposes.
